description: ELAREM™ Perform is a human Platelet Lysate of EU origin supporting in vitro expansion of various primary cells and cell lines. The xeno-free cell culture supplement meets the requirements of academic and industrial applications: The safe and performance-increasing cell growth promoter ensures efficient lab processes and a xeno-free cell culture environment. As a result, ELAREM™ Perform assures an easy transition of research results into clinical applications.Each batch of ELAREM™ Perform is produced from large pools of platelet units to ensure batch-to-batch consistency and enable reproducible conditions.
name: HPL ELAREM Perform Research Grade
